properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the file

properties.name: name
properties.description: The human readable name of the file - this is user chosen and does not need to be the actual file name

properties.name: size
properties.description: The number of bytes in the file

properties.name: mime
properties.description: The mime type of the file to be used in download requests

properties.name: owner
properties.description: The owner of this file, originally the user who uploaded it

properties.name: date
properties.description: The unix-second timestamp when the file was uploaded

properties.name: downloadURL
properties.description: The URL at which the file can be downloaded if it is stored at an external location
